name: Planet Pull
description:
Use the arrow keys to move your ship, Up activates thrust, Down decelerates, and Left/Right turn your ship. Pick up asteroids with your spring to pull them around, and press space to release them. There are 4 springs to find in total. If you want to drop a spring, press P. Sometimes springs will grab asteroids on their own, making them harder to find. Look for asteroids on planets that are behaving oddly to find them. If an asteroid turns red that means that its orbiting a planet!

-

MADE BY THESE AWESOME PEOPLE

Justin Capcap - Planet Gravity Guru

Keana Almario - Asteroid Orbit Ambassador

Michael Arcadi - Spring Pull Professor
